#include<stdio.h>
#define max(a, b) (((a) >= (b)) ? (a) : (b))
#define ll long long int
int main(){
	ll t, n, i; scanf("%lld", &t);
	while(t-- && scanf("%lld", &n)){
		ll w[n], t[n], m = 0;
		for(i = 0; i < n; scanf("%lld", &w[i++]));
		for(i = 0; i < n; scanf("%lld", &t[i++]));
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++)	m = max(w[i] * 3 + t[i], m);
		printf("%lld\n", m);
	}
	return 0;
}
